replies.body:
@ Petlas - I would be a dog, because they are  soo cute!! ^-^  
@ Frozie - Taiwan, probably KFC (lol), Dr Pepper, Grapes, turquoise, a dog (duh), Castle Adventures!!!, Porky's vid :D, it is great to be back on :)
@ Midnight - Congrats! I hate school. I like recess! (Maybe writing too)
